background_context.situation: Involved in a local newcomers club aimed at helping people who recently moved to Santa Barbara.
background_context.environment: Community-focused, involved in home improvement and event planning.
background_context.constraints: Limited budget and time as a volunteer organization.

goals_motivations.drives: Improving the digital presence of the Newcomers Club and enhancing the member experience.
goals_motivations.achievements: Wants to create a more vibrant and engaging community platform, facilitating connections for newcomers.

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Collaborates with other committee members and contractors on improvement projects; actively participates in discussions about digital enhancements.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Uses text messaging for quick communication; prefers direct interactions over emails.

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Outdated website design and functionality; challenges in communication and event organization.
pain_points_frustrations.issues: Frustration with lack of intuitive design in digital tools; difficulties in accessing information quickly.

needs_desires.improvements: Wants an upgraded website that reflects the upscale nature of the club with better visuals and easier navigation.
needs_desires.desires: A platform that facilitates communication among members, including a forum for sharing recommendations and advice.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes in the importance of community support for newcomers; values aesthetics in digital representation.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers a modern, visually appealing online presence that is easy to navigate.

technical_comfort.tools_used: Wild Apricot for member management; familiar with social media platforms.
technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with digital tools but desires better functionality.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Hands-on experience with tools; values straightforward, user-friendly interfaces.
